name: Mr Reason
description:
Use logic and spatial reasoning to move obstacles, hide treasure, and reach new skill levels.
Features:

• 50 levels divided on 6 different islands
• Use directional arrows to help Mr. Reason cover all the diamonds with crates, but be careful not to knock the crate off the platform!
• Ambient synthesizer background music, with option to turn it off or on
• View previous records for each level; records the least number of moves and the shortest time
• Game records how many moves you take to complete each level
• If you get stuck, click the reset button to begin the level back where you started

This challenging game will stretch your mind in new ways, causing you to think creatively and strategically.
